arts.ttl: Stoke City demand made as pressure mounts amid 'toxic' verdict after Cardiff City draw
arts.sum: Ben Gibson came to Stoke City's rescue as his stoppage-time equaliser prevented defeat at home to struggling Cardiff. Anwar El Ghazi levelled for the visitors and then took the lead when Gibson turned Chris Willock's saved shot into his own net.

arts.ttl: Stoke player ratings vs Cardiff as Ben Gibson saves boss from wall of fury
arts.sum: Andrew Moran had put Stoke in front when he followed up a rebound from close range but they were level before the break as Anwar El Ghazi beat the defensive line to tap in a deflected Joe Ralls cross inside the six-yard box. Stoke took advantage to take the lead in the 17th minute when Tatsuki Seko fed Ben Wilmot to slide a pass to Manhoef, who drove across the edge of the area from left to right, dummying shots before firing one to the bottom right corner.

arts.ttl: Cardiff City agony as stoppage-time Stoke City goal denies them first away win of the season
arts.sum: The Bluebirds led until the 95th minute but Potters skipper Ben Gibson scored to make it 2-2 at the bet365 Stadium

As they had against in their last away performance two weeks prior, City frustrated their hosts as the clock turned towards the final half hour of the fixture, with both Méïté and Willock holding the ball up well and drawing yellow cards from their markers in the process. City took the lead for the first time in the match with 15 minutes remaining, as Willock created a chance from nothing by dribbling into the area and hitting a powerful low cross in towards the six-yard box.

arts.ttl: Ben Gibson scores stoppage-time Stoke equaliser to atone for own goal
arts.sum: Cardiff were made to settle for a point that at least lifted them out of the relegation zone.

arts.ttl: Stoke City vs Cardiff live - Team news from the bet365 Stadium - Stoke-on-Trent Live
arts.sum: There haven’t been many first team players who have had to wait longer for their Stoke City debuts than Bosun Lawal. He’s a young player who just wants to play football, he loves it.

arts.ttl: What Stoke City boss has told players ahead of big Cardiff clash
arts.sum: Narcis Pelach is refusing to allow anyone in the Stoke City camp to feel sorry for themselves after two late defeats going into today’s crunch home game against Cardiff. Pelach knew he would need tough skin at times as head coach of a club like Stoke if he went through a spell like this one, without a win in six – and he insists he won’t panic under pressure and he has faith he is doing things that will shift the dial.
Pelach moved to top-flight club Girona in July 2019 to become assistant manager under Juan Carlos Unzué. In May 2023, Pelach joined Norwich City as assistant manager.

arts.ttl: ‘Not much to smile about’ – Stoke City vs Cardiff City prediction: The72
arts.sum: The72's writers offer their Stoke City vs Cardiff City prediction ahead of the Championship clash on Saturday. The post ‘Not much to smile about’ – Stoke City vs Cardiff City prediction: The72 appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Tottenham 'could recall teenager' from loan spell to combat defensive injury crisis
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur are reportedly considering whether to recall Ashley Phillips to help cover their defensive injury crisis.
